ai-atk-s0515a3:63_4: if she uses one to her when she goes to the further side of the five starting with one of the war,
ai-atk-s0515a3:63_7: they realize a place of loss.”
ai-atk-s0515a3:63_9: If you take hold of something, you must take:
ai-atk-s0515a3:63_10: one should be free from one’s head, one should emit semen.
ai-atk-s0515a3:64_0: whoever has a personal witness, “I have a sense of urgency,”
ai-atk-s0515a3:64_1: should be deluded from that person, for the sake of a person,
ai-atk-s0515a3:64_2: the one who overpowers (them) and swap (on his) moves.
ai-atk-s0515a3:64_3: The sage, who has gone beyond the locality, is depressed of the Sages.
ai-atk-s0515a3:64_4: he transcended the declaration of the Buddha, and rolling back and forth,
ai-atk-s0515a3:64_5: He has lived in the way already described, and is seeking the universal knowledge, because it is already described.
ai-atk-s0515a3:64_7: the shaking of the happiness he burned down on the blazing flashes.
ai-atk-s0515a3:65_0: On the Great Reference to the True Dhamma
ai-atk-s0515a3:66_0: The Description of the Universal Man
